branches.text: The streets are quiet tonight, save for the echo of your boots. A faint green glow leaks from an alley - and with it, the whisper of forbidden words. Someone"s practicing necromancy. As a city guard, that"s your problem now.

responses.response: Approach quietly, hand on sword hilt
Shout and demand they stop at once
Throw a rock to distract them

branches.text: You move closer, steps light as shadow. The necromancer mutters over a circle of bones, green sparks flickering between skeletal fingers. A half-built skeleton twitches - then its skull turns toward you.

responses.response: Draw your sword and rush in

branches.text: "City Guard! Step away from the bones!" you shout. The necromancer jumps, botching the spell. A burst of green light fills the alley, leaving the air thick with ozone and regret. When the smoke clears, they"re still standing - barely.

responses.response: Cuff them and drag them to the dungeon

branches.text: You hurl a rock across the alley. It clatters loudly, startling the necromancer into dropping a pouch of gold and several bones. The bones scatter harmlessly - looks like the ritual wasn"t finished yet.

responses.response: Take the chance to arrest them

branches.text: You grab the necromancer by the wrist before they can finish their next chant. "I was just practicing!" they protest. You roll your eyes - everyone says that. You drag them toward the city jail as the last of the green light fades from the stones. Another long night, but no undead roaming the streets - call that a win.
